name: ORANGE
description: The fruit is a spherical berry with a green-yellow to orange skin covered in indented glands and a segmented pulpy flesh and several seeds.

name: GRAPES
description: Grapes are fleshy, rounded fruits that grow in clusters made up of many fruits of greenish, yellowish or purple skin

name: MANGO
description: A mango is a sweet tropical fruit, and it's also the name of the trees on which the fruit grows

name: PINEAPPLE
description: Pineapples have yellow or white pulp, fleshy, aromatic, juicy and sweet.

name: JACKFRUIT
description: Jackfruit has a spiky outer skin and is green or yellow in color. One unique aspect of jackfruit is its unusually large size.

name: PAPAYA
description: The papaya fruit is slightly sweet, with an agreeable musky tang.
